poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Ach, the en-djinn-rickshaw
Jibs at the hill. One pint, two gills
Of gins and long-chain hydrocarbon
Chills in the fuel
Tank and jigs through the valves as
Passengers tuck in their double
Chins and shove. For all that
Working out with weights in gyms they
Never did. And now, by jings
